Campus Safety
Clubs and Activities
Share any unusual traditions or locations on campus
What to do for fun
Food and Dining
Dorm Life
Academic Rigor
Tips for prospective students
In three sentences
Comments
Overall I feel safe on campus. Campus police officers are always present and visible. They are available to escort students to places on campus when requested.
There are numerous organizations to become a part of. They include athletic clubs, fraternities and sororities, academic clubs, social, and media organizations.
we have a location on campus called 'the set'. this is where we gather and have small concerts, book fairs, food vendors.this is the place to 'hang out'.

On campus we have a bowling alley, beauty and barber salon, and a game room. Having these on campus prevents us from always leaving campus looking for things to do in our leisure and campus security is always available.We also have an area where students gather to hang out and fellowship with each other.

In the food and dining area we have a food court so we are able to choose from different places to eat and variety of foods. with the meal plan each student is given a card that allows them to purchase from the available food vendors.

Dorm life is great. It feels like you have your own place away from home because you are allowed to bring items in like refrigerators, microwaves, and televisions. I feel very safe because all the entrances have to be accessed with the student badge only and to add to the feeling of security there are not multiple entrances and exits.

The classes that I have taken so far have been what I expected for my first year in college. I have to study a lot and take lots of notes because there is so much information. I was able to pass all of my classes the first semester and look forward to passing the next semester as well.
Because of the climate here in Tallahassee I would advise all incoming students to bring clothes for very warm weather and raincoats, rain boots, and hat because it rains a lot.

overall I rate this school as very good. I am in my second semester and during my first semester I knew without a doubt that I will be continuing and completing my education here. I will be acquiring a doctorate degree in Pharmacy.
pageTitle: Florida Agricultural and Mechanical University (FAMU) Reviews: Student Reviews and Ratings | Cappex

It is a university who prides themselves on the success of their students. Like every school there are students who come here just to play around. textAfterTable: Tips for prospective students Be prepared to have fun but work hard. Its a great HBCU and you will learn alot. FAMU is a historical school that has many activities and clubs that anyone would love to join. Any major you choose you will excel in at Florida A&M as long as you remain focused. Remember what you came to college for and maintain that goal throughout your years of attending any college.
